common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/v2/public/integrations/lazada')
request.add_api_parameter("manifestId", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("stops", "[{\"address\":\"na\",\"phone\":\"na\",\"jobs\":[{\"weightInGram\":\"na\",\"heightInCm\":\"na\",\"lengthInCm\":\"na\",\"type\":\"na\",\"trackingNumber\":\"na\",\"widthInCm\":\"na\"},{\"weightInGram\":\"na\",\"heightInCm\":\"na\",\"lengthInCm\":\"na\",\"type\":\"na\",\"trackingNumber\":\"na\",\"widthInCm\":\"na\"}],\"type\":\"na\",\"customerName\":\"na\"}]")
request.add_api_parameter("traceId", "na")
request.add_api_parameter("authToken", "auth")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/v2/public/integrations/lazada')
request.add_api_param('manifestId', '1')
request.add_api_param('stops', '[{\"address\":\"na\",\"phone\":\"na\",\"jobs\":[{\"weightInGram\":\"na\",\"heightInCm\":\"na\",\"lengthInCm\":\"na\",\"type\":\"na\",\"trackingNumber\":\"na\",\"widthInCm\":\"na\"},{\"weightInGram\":\"na\",\"heightInCm\":\"na\",\"lengthInCm\":\"na\",\"type\":\"na\",\"trackingNumber\":\"na\",\"widthInCm\":\"na\"}],\"type\":\"na\",\"customerName\":\"na\"}]')
request.add_api_param('traceId', 'na')
request.add_api_param('authToken', 'auth')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
